item.description:
Here's a question for you: What's the most fun way to spend a Monday night?

If you answered "trivia", you might just have what we're looking for. If you answered "hanging out with the most awesome group EVER", you can join us too. If you answered "playing with a rubber duckie", you may want to seek professional assistance (but come play trivia with us first).

The game consists of answering AS A TEAM forty questions, spread out over four categories.

Even if you don't think you'll know many of the answers, come hang out with us and get to know some friendly people.

Great groups to compete against and we don't want to boast, but we will, we have won many times. Cool Prizes.
item.name: Trivia at Gas Lamp! Fun Group! Great time!
